title: font name
content:
I want to know what is this font???

author: mdsagar

comments.content:
I trust you will get a good answer if you post your request at the Font Identification forum [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414175502/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")  
Look forward to seeing you there.  
Don
